model.graphics

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.graphics.Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends Object

    The Class Sprite contains one or more images.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matthieu CARTERON matthieu.carteron@viacesi.fr
